metadata.title: CVE-2021-29957 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If a MIME encoded email contains an OpenPGP inline signed or encryptedmessage part, but also contains an additional unprotected part, Thunderbirddid not indicate that only parts of the message are protected. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.10.2.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
